description.value:
Imitating animal threat displays, you make yourself appear larger and more imposing.

Roll one Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Demoralize]{Demoralize} and compare the result to the Will DC of each animal, fungus, and plant creature in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. When you do, Demoralize gains the visual trait, and creatures are affected if they can see you. You don't take a penalty if the creature doesn't understand your language.
